parameter.name: status
parameter.description: The status. Be sure to URL encode as necessary, and keep the message under 140 characters.

parameter.name: inReplyToStatusId
parameter.description: The ID of an existing status that the update is in reply.

parameter.name: possiblySensitive
parameter.description: If you upload Tweet media that might be considered sensitive content such as nudity, violence, or medical procedures, you should set this value to true

parameter.name: latitude
parameter.description: The latitude of the location this tweet refers to.

parameter.name: longitude
parameter.description: The longitude of the location this tweet refers to

parameter.name: displayCoordinates
parameter.description: Whether or not to put a pin on the exact coordinates a tweet has been sent from.

parameter.name: trimUser
parameter.description: When set to either true, t or 1, each Tweet returned in a timeline will include a user object including only the status authors numerical ID

parameter.name: mediaIds
parameter.description: A list of media_ids to associate with the Tweet.
